img.alt: Buhler FFA Plant Sale Thumbnail Image

h1.div: Buhler FFA Annual plant sale starts today - ONLINE ONLY! Please click on the link to place your order!
Beginning on Monday, April 6th, USD 313 will be allowing parents or guardians to pick up a meal permit for their children’s meals.

img.alt: USD 313 NAMES NEW SUPERINTENDENT Thumbnail Image

h1.div: March 27, 2020 The USD 313 Board of Education has announced the selection of Mrs. Cindy Couchman, as the new superintendent. Mrs. Couchman will take the reins on July 1, 2020, after the retirement of Mr. Mike Berblinger at the end of the 2019-20 school year.

img.alt: USD 313 BOARD OF EDUCATION TO INTERVIEW SUPERINTENDENT CANDIDATE Thumbnail Image

h1.a: USD 313 BOARD OF EDUCATION TO INTERVIEW SUPERINTENDENT CANDIDATE
h1.div: Mrs. Cindy Couchman will be interviewing for the position of superintendent with the board of education the afternoon of March 26, 2020.
